issue.title: [CF 694] Help popup when enabling Show Timer Text without a handler installer
issue.body:
See http://www.curse.com/addons/wow/tellmewhen?comment=2795

Basically, pop up a yellow help message when a user enables Show Timer Text but does not have one of the most common addons (OmniCC tullacc, Tukui, any many others) that lets them know that TMW doesn't recognize that they have a proper addon, but that the timer text may still show anyway if they have an addon that TMW doesn't recognize


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #694 | Raw

comments.body:
Added in r669


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
